Sabita is a young entrepreneur of 24 years. She is a mother of one son who is now a kid. She lives with her family in a remote village, Parengerpar of Falakata. Sabita’s husband is a mason by occupation; his work is on a seasonal basis, thus his income is inconsistent. 

In order to provide financial support to her family, Sabita is involved in animal husbandry. She rears cows and supplies milk to her neighbors and local villagers. For additional income, she also sells cattle byproducts like cow dung to the local people for fuel. Day by day, her number of customers is increasing. As she has the knowledge of rearing cows, she has chosen this milk selling, and milk has a high demand in her local market. But now she needs to increase her business to satisfy her customers. 

Thus Sabita applied for a loan from Kiva’s partner BJS to purchase a dairy cow. She hopes this financial assistance will definitely increase her business profit. In the future, she wants to purchase agricultural land and save money with the profit generated from her business. 

She is highly obliged towards her lenders.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow for her milk selling business.

loans.name: Mousumi

texts.en:
Mousumi is a 22-year-old rural woman. Unfortunately, she could not study more than grade 8 in her childhood due to the lack of economic resources of her parents. She is a responsible housewife and a dedicated mother of two sons now. Both of her sons are kids. Her husband, Noni Gopal, is engaged in agricultural activities. They live in Chuakhola village in Falakata.
 
Her husband has an agricultural farmland where he grows different vegetables in different seasons. He has been in this business for few years. He struggles hard to grow good-quality vegetables to satisfy his customers, but his earnings are not as much as he expects. His land is very fertile and productive. So, he has decided to cultivate teasel gourd on the farmland. The main obstacle is capital.

Mousumi is also a very hardworking and enterprising lady. Though she is a housewife, she helps her husband in his agricultural activities. Now she is seeking a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to purchase agricultural supplies such as teasel gourd seeds, manure, etc. She hopes the business will be a lucrative one, as teasel gourd has a very good demand in the market. So, they have chosen this crop to cultivate.

Her goals are to strengthen her family business and provide a better education to her sons. 

She thanks her lenders for helping her financially.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers for teasel gourd cultivation.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is 50 years old and married with four children, two who are still in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. She has a business selling detergent soap in the Philippines. Juliet has been in this business for 10 years. She has requested a 14,000 PHP (Philippine peso) loan through NWTF to purchase more detergent soap to sell.

Juliet successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. In the future, Juliet would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more detergent soap to sell.

loans.name: Astria

texts.en:
Astria is 57 years old and married with four children, who are in school.

Astria is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs. She has been raising pigs for 5 years now, and has borrowed 12 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Astria would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie is 48 years old and married. She has eight children, six of whom are currently in school.

Elsie is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock. She has been raising livestock for 3 years now, and has borrowed 10 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Beverly

texts.en:
Beverly is married and she works hard to support her family. 

She has a pig fattening business in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feeds, vaccines and vitamins for her pigs. She has been in this business for 11 years now.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Beverly would like to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to purchase feeds, vaccines and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Marjorie Guadalupe

texts.es:
En la parroquia crucita del cantón Portoviejo, se reúnen las socias del Grupo de Crédito Amigas Solidarias, esta localidad se la conoce por sus hermosas playas que rodean este lindo lugar y que son muy visitadas por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, se la conoce con el nombre de  “Crucita la Bella”.
En este lugar vive la señora Marjorie, tiene 30 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos  hijos de 6 y 1 año,  el mayor estudia en y escuela. El marido se dedica a la pesca.
Doña Marjorie tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa, allí vende todo tipo de víveres, artículos  de bazar y papelería que es lo mas necesita en esta época del año, trabaja todos días y casi todo el día, su negocio cada vez está más surtido y esto por la ayuda de los crédito razón por lo cual ella está muy agradecida con la institución. Tiene más de 14 años con su negocio y cada vez lo mejora más.
Ella está repitiendo el crédito pues de esta forma ella financia su negocio ahora la mayor parte del crédito es para comprar útiles escolares y aprovechar la temporada y varios  otros productos de primera necesidad. Lleva 5 ciclos en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta ya que con los créditos cada día mejora su tienda. Sus sueños es agrandar su tienda.
texts.en:
The Amigas Solidarias lending group meets every two weeks in the Crucita Parrish, area of the Portoviejo settlement. This area is known for the beautiful beaches that surround this beautiful place and are well visited by local and international tourists. It’s known as “Crucita la Bella.” 

Marjorie lives here. She is 30 years old, is in a live in relationship, and has two children, ages 6 and 1. The older child attends school. Her husband is a fisherman.

Marjorie has a food store in her home and sells all types of grocery products, personal products and school supplies which are needed most at this time of year. She works every day, almost all day, and her business stocks more inventory thanks to the loans from the institution for which she is grateful.   She has been doing this for more than 14 years and business is improving constantly. 

She will use most of the money from this new loan to stock her store with school supplies to take advantage of the season, and other basic goods.  She has been with the lending group for five cycles and she likes it because the loans are a great help to her. He dream is for her store to grow more each day.

loans.use: To buy school supplies and basic needs products.

loans.name: Efren Edilberto

texts.es: Efren, tiene 55 años de edad, esta soltero, tiene 3 hijos mayores de edad, que no dependen de el, reside en una aldea de la Masica, Atlántida. Lleva varios años de dedicarse a la extracción de dientes y a la elaboración de placa dental. Este negocio lo tiene en su casa y cuenta con clientela en la comunidad. Con el fin de cumplir con un pedido de placas dentales de sus clientes ha solicitado un préstamo por 20,000 lempiras con el cual va comprar los materiales que utiliza para la elaboración de placas dentales. El está motivado a seguir trabajando con el negocio para mejorar sus ingresos y su bienestar económico.
texts.en: Efren, 55, is single and has three adult, independent children.  He lives in a village called Masica in Atlantida.  For several years he has been extracting teeth and making dental plates.  His business is set up at home and he has customers in the community.  In order to fill the pending orders he has from customers for dental plates he is requesting a loan in the amount of 20,000 HNL to buy the materials to make the plates.  He is motivated to continue working to improve his income and economic welfare.

loans.use: To buy dental plate supplies.

loans.name: Teresa Virginia

texts.es:
En la parroquia crucita del cantón Portoviejo, se reúnen las socias del Grupo de Crédito Amigas Solidarias, esta localidad se la conoce por sus hermosas playas que rodean este lindo lugar y que son muy visitadas por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, se la conoce con el nombre de  “Crucita la Bella”.
En este lugar vive la señora Teresa, tiene 40 años de edad,  está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos de 21, 19, 14 y 6 años de edad, los tres menores estudian en universidad, colegio y escuela y son los que aun viven con ella. Su esposo trabaja en un bus de transporte.
Doña Teresa es una mujer que le gusta tener sus ingresos los mismos que invierte en la educación de sus hijos, ella tiene una granja en su casa donde cria pollos por temporada, compra los pollos cuando aun están pequeños y luego cuando están listos los entrega a comerciantes y también les vende a los vecinos de la localidad, actualmente necesita de este crédito para comprar pollos para seguir con su negocio, ella está repitiendo el crédito ya que así es como logra financiarse ya que sus ganancias siempre las invierte en la educación de sus hijos, ella agradece a la institución y a quienes hacen posible que los créditos puedan llegar ya que es así como ellos logran salir adelante. 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar pollos y alimentos para que tengan buen desarrollo. Lleva 4 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan mucho. Sus sueños son que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
The Amigas Solidarias lending group meets every two weeks in the Crucita Parrish, area of the Portoviejo settlement. This area is known for the beautiful beaches that surround this beautiful place and are well visited by local and international tourists. It’s known as “Crucita la Bella.” 

Teresa lives here. She is 40 years old, married, and has four children, ages 21, 19, 14, and 6. The three youngest attend university, high school, and elementary school and still live with her. Her husband works as a bus driver. 

Teresa is a person who likes to earn her own income which she spends on her children's education.  She has a barnyard at home where she raises chickens. She buys the chickens when they are small, keeps them for three months as free range and sells them to merchants when they are ready. She also sells to local residents. 

She is currently in need of a loan to buy chickens to continue with the business.  She is requesting a new loan to finance the business because her profit goes toward her children's education.  She is grateful to the institution which grants the loan and allows her family to get ahead.

She will use the money from this loan to buy chickens and chicken feed. She has been with the lending group for four years and she likes it because the loans are a great help to her. Her dream is to see her children become professionals.

loans.use: To buy chickens and chicken feed.

loans.name: Amanda Alicia

texts.es: Amanda de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija, ella  posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace 6 años, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Amanda, 42, lives in her own house with her husband and daughter.  She runs a small store at home and has been in business for eight years.  She has many customers because of her low prices and kind customer service.  The profit she earns is used to cover some of the household expenses.  She is requesting a loan to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, sweets, pastries, etc. in order to earn more income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, sweets, pastries, etc.

loans.name: Rutilio

texts.es: Don Rutilio de 54 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus cuatro hijos, el es un hombre muy trabajador se dedica a la reparación y venta de reloj desde hace mas de 15 años el cual la inicio con capital propio, su negocio esta ubicado cerca de su casa en una zona muy transitada, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de reloj y repuestos todo por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y así poder tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Rutilio, 54, lives in his own house with his four children.  He is a very hard worker and has been repairing and selling watches for over 15 years.  He started the business with his own capital and set it up near his home in a very busy area.  He uses the profit from sales to cover some of the household expenses.

He is requesting a loan to buy wholesale watches and spare parts to continue his sales activity and earn more profit.

loans.use: To buy wholesale watches and spare parts.

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es: Maria de 32 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, ella se dedica a la venta y elaboración de pupusas, jugos y licuados lleva 8 años de experiencia en la actividad la cual inicio con capital propio, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de quesillo, chicharron, maíz, frijoles, frutas, azúcar, entre otros, para continuar con sus ventas y así poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: María is 32 years old and she lives in a privately-owned house with her husband and son. María has been making a living selling “pupusas” (a thick corn tortilla stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans), juices and smoothies for eight years. She started the business, which is located in her home, with her own money and is able to pay some household expenses with profits from sales. María is applying for a loan in order to buy fresh cheese, pork scratchings, corn, beans, fruits, sugar and more to continue with her sales and thus earn a higher income.

loans.use: to buy fresh cheese, pork scratchings, corn, beans, fruits, sugar and more.

loans.name: Maria Anita

texts.es: Doña Maria de 50 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas desde hace 7 años, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes gracias a su trabajo y a la ayuda de su esposo es como pueden salir adelante con los gastos del hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por quintales para poder continuar con la elaboración de las tortillas y así poder tener mejores ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: María is 50 years old and lives in a privately-owned house with her husband. She has been making a living selling tortillas for seven years and runs the business out of her home. María has many customers thanks to her hard work and the help of her husband. The business allows the couple to pay household bills. María is applying for a loan in order to buy corn by the hundredweight and continue producing tortillas. María can thus earn a higher income in order to enjoy a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn by the hundredweight.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy brushed wood and nails, and to pay labourers.

loans.name: Lakshmi

texts.en:
Lakshmi is a 46-year-old rural woman. She is married and lives with her husband in the village of Dakshin Parengerpar in Falakata. Lakshmi and her husband both are illiterate, and are able to sign their names only, due to the financial constraints of their family. She has two sons who are associated with farming. Her husband is a mason by profession.

She too is active and assists her sons in agricultural activities. They grow different types of vegetables and crops. Now Lakshmi's ventures to cultivate maize on her farmland to diversify her agribusiness. As the crop has a tremendous acceptability in the market, Lakshmi and her sons expect good revenue from it.   

So she is requesting a loan from BJS (Kiva's partner), as they have no working capital. Lakshmi will invest this new loan in buying high yield maize seeds, fertilizer and manure, which will ultimately help in generating more income and productivity as well. She hopes it will improve her family’s financial status for leading a smooth, secured life. With the profit, she dreams of building a pakka house (concrete) in the future.

Lakshmi is thankful for her lenders.

loans.use: To purchase farm supplies for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Parbwati

texts.en:
Parbwati lives in Singijani village in Falakata in West Bengal. She is a married woman of 44 years. She has a small family comprising two members: her husband and one son. Her son is pursuing his B.A. in Education (Bachelor in Arts) and her husband is a farmer by profession.

Like most families in the locality, she is doing a milk supplying business. She sells milk to her villagers on a retail basis. She also sells byproducts like cow dung, which is widely used as manure. Her husband helps her in supplying milk to her customers. Parbwati diligently saves a little amount and sets it aside for her son's education. The rest is spent for her family's household expenses. But realistically, she is aware that the amount she must save should be much more, if she has to provide a complete education to her son and improve their family’s living.

So, she wants to take a loan from Kiva through BJS to purchase a milking cow.  The extra milk from the cow will bring in an extra income per month, which is a small beginning, but it amounts to a substantial amount at the end of the year. It will be a key step towards Parbwati's goal of earning more, saving better, and achieving financial independence to provide a good future for her son. She has a long-cherished dream of building a concrete house for them. 

Parbwati is grateful to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase a milking cow for her dairy business.

loans.name: Debati

texts.en:
Debati is a 29-year-old married woman and the mother of two sons. She has completed her education up to grade 5. Her sons go to a nearby village school and are studying in different grades. She lives with her family in a small village of Dakhin Parengerpar in Falakata.  

Her husband, Bipin is a mason by profession, engaged in centering work on houses. Centering is a temporary structure upon which bamboo, rods, and planks are laid during construction. Debati is a housewife who always supports her family and her husband. She is active and energetic to go ahead and get over all the financial hurdles. She needs to expand the family run business in order to strengthen the economic condition. Now, her husband wants to buy more wood, tools and iron accessories for this business. Debati has decided to help her husband and she has applied for a loan from BJS (Kiva's partner) to buy necessary raw materials for the foundations of many houses in her local area. 

With the profit, she hopes to enhance her husband’s business and earn more, which will increase her family’s financial status. 
Debati and her husband are thankful to BJS and Kiva for supporting them financially.

loans.use: To buy required materials for her husband's centering business.

loans.name: Yezenia Marisol

texts.es: Yezenia de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, tiene 10 años de dedicarse a esa actividad la cual inicio con capital propio, su negocio está ubicado cerca de su asa en una zona mu transitada, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas frutas y verduras por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: 37-year old Yezenia lives in her own house with her husband and three children. She earns her living selling fruit and vegetables, a job she's had for 10 years. She used her own capital to start the business which is located next to her barbecue in a very busy area. With the money she earns, Yezenia manages to pay for household expenses. She is seeking a loan to buy fruit and vegetables in bulk so she can continue with her business and have a bigger income

loans.use: buymore fruit and vegetables in bulk

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es: Marcelina de 48 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal, tiene 9 años de dedicarse a las ventas la cual inicio con capital propio, también tenia un molino de nixtamal pero no le daba muchas ganancias, ahora con las ventas que realiza de los productos logra solventar algunos gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos por mayor como perfumes, desodorantes, cremas, lociones, etc. para poder seguir con sus ventas y asi tener mejores ingresos económicos y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Marcelina is 48 years old and lives in her own house with her two children. She earns a living selling personal use products. She has been doing this for 9 years and started with her own capital. She also has a boiled corn mill but she does not earn much from this. Now with the sales of her products she manages to pay for some household expenses. She is asking for a loan to buy more products in bulk such as perfumes, creams, lotions, etc. in order to continue with her sales and thus have a better income and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more products in bulk such as perfumes, deodorants, creams, lotions, etc.

loans.name: Alba Alicia

texts.es: Alba de 44 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, sus dos hijos y sus dos nietos, alba posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia donde vende una variedad de productos tiene varios años de tener su negocio el cual inicio con capital propio por la necesidad de afrontar los gastos de la casa,  ella quiere invertir más en su negocio por esa razón solicita un crédito para la compra de mas sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Alba is 44 years old and lives in her own home with her husband, her two children and her two grandchildren. She owns a small shop within her home where she sells a variety of products. She has been doing this for several years and she started it with her own capital in order to cover household expenses. She wants to invest more in her business and so she is asking for a loan to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, sweets, sweet bread, etc., and therefore be able to have a better income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, sweets, sweet bread, etc.

loans.name: Patricia Jeaneth

texts.es: Patricia vive en casa propia con su madre y su hija, ella posee una venta de comida ubicado cerca de su casa en una zona muy transitada, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios, tiene 6 años de tener su negocio y gracias a sus ventas es como puede salir adelante con los gastos del hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas materia prima arroz, pollos, carne, frijoles, fruta, verduras, etc. para variar su menú y asi tener mejores ingresos económicos para un mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Patricia lives in her own home with her mother and her daughter. She own a food sales point which is located in her home in a very busy area. She has a lot of customers because of her good prices. She has had this business for 6 years and thanks to her sales she has been able to get ahead with her household costs. She is asking for a loan to buy more raw materials such as rice, chicken, meat, beans, fruit, vegetables, etc. in order to vary her menu and thus earn a better income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more raw materials such as rice, chicken, meat, beans, fruit, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: Juan de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus cinco hijos, el posee desde hace mas de 10 años una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Juan is 37 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and his five children. For over 10 years he has owned a small shop located in his home. He has many customers because of his good prices and his friendliness when selling. With what he earns he manages to pay for some household costs. He is asking for a loan to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, sweets, sweet bread, etc. and thus be able to earn a better income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, sweets, sweet bread, etc.

loans.name: Doris Elizabeth

texts.es: Doris de 44 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal de manera ambulante por las diferentes colonias tiene aproximadamente 4 años de dedicare a esa actividad con la cual ha podido salir adelante, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos como perfumes, lociones, cremas, shampoo, desodorantes etc. todo por mayor y así poder seguir con su trabajo para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Doris is 44 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and her two children. She earns a living selling personal products travelling around through the different communities. She has been doing this for 4 years and it has allowed her to get ahead in life. She is asking for a loan to buy more products such as perfumes, lotions, creams, shampoo, deodorants, etc. all in bulk and thus be able to continue working to earn a better income.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, lotions, creams, shampoo, deodorant, etc., all in bulk.

loans.name: Rosa Efigenia

texts.es: Doña Rosa de 64 años de edad es viuda vive en casa propia con su hijo, ella se dedica a la elaboración de trapeadores y mandiles decorados desde hace mas de 20 años, ya tiene clientes fijos que la buscan por los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de telas, hilos y adornos todo por mayor para poder continuar con su trabajo y asi poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Rosa is 64 years old and is a widow. She lives in her own home with her child. For over 20 years she has earned a living making mops and decorated aprons. She already has permanent customers who look for her because of her good prices. With what she earns she manages to pay for some household expenses. She is asking for a loan in order to buy fabric, threads and decorations all in bulk in order to continue her work and thus earn a better income.

loans.use: to buy fabric, threads and decorations, all in bulk.

loans.name: Romilia Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Romilia de 52  años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos de engorde, desde hace 5 años, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias ha logra salir adelante con su, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de concentrado y mas pollos,  y asi continuar con la crianza para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Romilia is 52 years old. She lives in her own home with her family group. She has raised and sold broiler chickens for 5 years. With what she obtains from her profits she has been able to get ahead with her family. She is asking for a loan to buy concentrate and more chickens. This way, she can continue to raise them to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy concentrate and more chickens.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: Juan de 32 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa,  él se dedica a la carpintería, tiene varios años de dedicarse a ese actividad la cual la inicio por la necesidad de sacar adelante a su familia,  su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia,  el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de madera, pega, barniz etc. para continuar con su trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Juan is 32 years old. He lives in his own home with his wife. He works in carpentry and has been doing this activity for several years. He started doing it out of the necessity of getting his family ahead.  His business is located in his residence. He is asking for a loan to buy wood, glue, varnish, etc., to continue with his work and have better income.

loans.use: to buy wood, glue, varnish, etc.

loans.name: Luis Angel

texts.es: Don luis de 60 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado, tiene 15 años de dedicarse a esa actividad la cual inicio con fondos propios, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo es como puede salir adelante, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas ganando por mayor para poder continuar con su trabajo y así poder tener junto con su esposa una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Luis is 60 years old. He lives in his own home with his wife. He raises and sells cattle. He has been doing this activity for 15 years and he started it with his own money. He is able to get ahead with what he earns from his job. He is asking for a loan to buy more cattle wholesale to continue with his work and thus be able to have a better quality of life with his wife.

loans.use: to buy more cattle wholesale.

loans.name: Eleodora Maximina

texts.es:
En la ciudadela El Progreso de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúne cada quince días el Grupo De Crédito Santa Rosa Del Cielo esta es una zona urbano marginal muy poblada en esta ciudad en la cual las personas se dedican a sus actividades para salir adelante.
En este lugar vive la señora Eleodora, tiene 56 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos mayores de edad, uno de ellos aun vive en su casa. Su esposo es chofer.
Doña Eleodora es una mujer que le gusta a base de trabajo salir adelante, ella tiene una tienda de víveres y bazar  en su casa, allí vende productos de primera necesidad, carnes, pescado, legumbres, gaseosas, helados, ropa, perfumes, útiles escolares y muchos otros productos,  trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00, allí le ayuda su marido y sus hijos cuando ellos pueden pero por lo general es ella que está atenta a brindar la mejor atención a sus clientes que siempre compran en su local. Para ella los créditos han sido de mucha ayuda ya que así ha podido mejorar su negocio y así brindar un mejor servicio,  lleva más de 30 años con este negocio el cual le permite salir adelante.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir más su tienda con productos de primera necesidad, artículos de bazar y papelería. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por los servicios que ofrece la institución. Sus sueños son mejorar su tienda y tener mayor variedad de productos.
texts.en:
The loan group Santa Rosa Del Cielo meets fortnightly in El Progreso, a neighborhood in the city of Portoviejo. This is a highly populated and marginalized area. Locals get ahead through their different activities. Eleodora lives here. She is 56 years old. She is married and has three adult children; one of them still lives with her. Her husband is a driver.

Eleodora is a woman that likes to work hard in order to get ahead. She sells groceries and clothes at home: basic products, meat, fish, vegetables, sodas, ice cream, clothes, perfumes, school supplies and many other products. She works every day from 6:00 am until 8:00 pm. Her husband and her children help her when they can, but she is normally the one taking care of the customers that come to her store. The loans have been very useful for them. They have been able to improve the business and offer a better service. She has been in business for more than thirty years, which is how she has managed to get ahead.

She will use this loan to increase her stock levels. She will buy basic products, clothes and accessories, and stationery products. She has been a member of this group since the beginning. She likes to be a member because of the different services offered by the institution. Her dream is to improve her store and have a wider variety of products to offer.

loans.use: to buy basic produtcs, clothes and accessories, and stationery products.

loans.name: Nury Rebeca

texts.es: Nury de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de segunda mano, tiene 4 años de dedicarse a la venta la cual la realiza casa por casa, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas ropa por mayor para continuar con su trabajo y asi poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Nury, 31, owns a house where she lives with her husband and daughter. She sells used clothes. She has been doing this for four years, selling door-to-door. With the profits she makes, she manages to cover some of the home expenses.

Nury is requesting a loan to buy more clothes in bulk in order to continue working and increase her income.

loans.use: to buy clothes in bulk.

loans.name: Carlos Alfredo

texts.es: Don Carlos de 68 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hija, él se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y frijoles, tiene 40 años de experiencia en la agricultura y empezó con capital propio, comercializa sus productos todos los meses del año en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abono, etc. y asi poder tener un mejor cultivo y darle su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carlos is 68 years old. He owns a house where he lives with his wife and daughter. He works in agriculture, growing corn and beans. He has been in business for forty years and started with his own money. He sells his produce all year round at different local markets.

Carlos is requesting a loan to buy seeds, chemical and organic fertilizers, etc. His plantations will improve and he will be able to improve his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy seeds, chemical and organic fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Mayra Del Carmen

texts.es:
En la ciudadela El Progreso de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúne cada quince días el Grupo De Crédito Santa Rosa Del Cielo esta es una zona urbano marginal muy poblada en esta ciudad en la cual las personas se dedican a sus actividades para salir adelante.
En este lugar vive la señora Mayra, tiene 32 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 11 y 9 años de edad, ambos estudian en colegio y escuela. Su esposo trabaja en una imprenta.
Doña Mayra con la finalidad de contar con sus propios ingresos y con esto ayudar con los gastos del hogar  se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo y sabanas,  su forma de venta es puerta a puerta,  trabaja todos los días por ratos ya que ella no cuenta con horarios fijos, también vende en su casa cuando algún cliente necesita de alguna prenda, en su casa también ella realiza recargas telefónicas con lo cual le quedan ingresos extra, ella lleva más de 5  años en su negocio el cual le da lo necesario para los gastos sobretodo de los estudios de sus hijos. 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar ropa de todo tipo, sabanas y recargas telefónicas. Esta desde el inicio  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan mucho a ella y a su familia. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
The loan group Santa Rosa Del Cielo meets fortnightly in El Progreso, a neighborhood in the city of Portoviejo. This is a highly populated and marginalized area. Locals get ahead through their different activities. Mayra, 32, lives here. She lives in a common-law marriage and has two children aged 11 and 9, who go to school. Her partner works for a printer.

Mayra wants to generate her own income in order to contribute to the family’s economy. She sells all kinds of clothes and bed sheets, door-to-door. She works every day but without a fixed schedule. She also sells at home when customers need something special. She also sells prepaid phone cards, which results in an extra income for her. She has been in business for more than five years, and this is how she has managed to cover different expenses, especially her children’s education.

She will use this loan to buy all kinds of clothes, bed sheets and prepaid phone cards. She has been a member of the loan group since the beginning and likes to be one because these loans help her and her family a lot. Her dream is to be able to give her family all the best.

loans.use: to buy clothes, bed sheets and prepaid phone cards.

loans.name: Sinam

texts.en:
Sinam is from Vanadzor city of Lori region.  Thanks to her first Kiva loan, Sinam greatly wants to cooperate with Kiva and Nor Horizon for the second time.

Sinam, with her specialty of accounting, for many years has managed to run a clothing trading business very cleverly and profitably.  She sells baby clothes, children's clothes, cradles, towels, bedding, covers, at the city’s wholesale market at a rented stall. She is always kind and happy to each of her customer, no matter if they do any shopping or not. 

She obtains her stall’s products from Turkey, but mainly from Yerevan wholesale markets, with the help of her husband.  Sinam has two sons; the elder is a student and smallest is school-aged. Since Sinam’s husband is unemployed, the family needs are covered only through her business income.  That is why she cares for it very much and hopes that very soon she will have her own space and get rid of the waste of renting a stall. 

This loan Sinam asks for, as she wants to buy a new spring-summer assortment of children clothes for her business.

loans.use: to buy a new spring-summer assortment of children clothes for her business, to support her family in hard times

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a larger amount of food products to diversify her sales.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is young, ambitious and a caring father of one child.  He is 23 years old and lives in Irbid with his small family.

Ibrahim could not complete his education because of the financial situation of his father, and this was the first dream of Ibrahim that had been lost it. He always wants to be a successful man with a good degree and to be able to provides a good life and good education for his son.

He worked for a low income and it was not enough for him to cover the household expenses, but because of his willpower, he started his own business. This is a coffee roasting shop, which also sells food supplies. He is happy in his small business and he wants to develop his work to increase his income, therefore he applied for a loan to help him buy more supplies in order to produce a larger amount of coffee and food supplies to sell

loans.use: to buy a larger amount of coffee to sell and also more kinds of food supplies to sell, to help support his son

loans.name: Alvera

texts.en:
Alvera is 52 years old. She is married with 5 children aged between 14 and 32 years, 3 of them go to school. She sells sacks and she has been in this business for 11 years. Her husband is a farmer. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more sacks,crates and jerrycans for sell. The profits from the business will be used to increase her savings. In future, she wishes to earn at least 100,000 per month.

loans.use: To buy more sacks, crates and jerrycans for sell.

loans.name: Nawal

texts.en:
Nawal is the mother of five children, living in a small village.  She suffers from a low standard of living and that is why she decided to start her own business in poultry and livestock, in order to support her husband and to improve the standards of living for her kids.

Now Nawal needs to develop her work to increase her income and to be able help her husband more and more with the household expenses  Therefore she applied for loan to help her buy more poultry and livestock to raise her sales and profit.

loans.use: To buy more poultry and livestock to raise her sales and profit.

loans.name: Sameer

texts.en:
Sameer is retired. He is 57 years old and lives in east Amman.  He is married with three children. 

After he retired, his pension was not enough to meet the needs of his household, so he decided to start a business, with help from his wife. He is working in commerce and sells everyday products from his small store.

Sameer wants to increase his income because his children are getting bigger and their needs increase. Due to this, he is thinking to expand and develop his work to raise their standard of living, by buying more kinds of products to sell and also to redecorate his general shop to attract more customers  

Because of his financial situation, he applied for a loan to help him do what he needs and achieve his goals.

loans.use: To buy more kinds of products to sell and to redecorate his general shop to attract more customers

loans.name: Nongbua Group

texts.en:
Khankeo’s village sources much of their drinking water from local wells, streams and collected rainwater.  These sources of water are not safe to drink without treatment by boiling.  Khankeo and her group are excited that the filter was available on a payment plan that made it much more affordable.  

Treating drinking water requires cash and time, which now she can shift to other pursuits.  Khankeo and her village also understand the impact unsafe drinking water has on their family’s budgets. The filter is guaranteed for 2 years; within this 2 years filter users, like Khankeo’s family, identify a substantial decrease in illness and associated medical costs.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Nongdern Group

texts.en: Thongma understands the difference the water filter can make for her family and for her group’s families.  Thongma knows that local water sources require boiling before consumption and boiling water consumes natural and financial resources.  The water filter Thongma purchased will increase her family’s disposable income by substantially decreasing money spent to buy charcoal or decreasing the time and cost foraging for firewood.  The filter also eliminates the need to purchase bottled water if it is available.    Thongma is excited that the filter was purchased on an affordable payment schedule and the filter is guaranteed for 2 years – so she and her group can continue to receive the many benefits of clean water for many months to come.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Gayane

texts.en:
Gayane is 42 years old and she lives with her son and retired mother in Vanadzor city of Lori region. Gayane’s son now is in the army passing his military service. 

For many years at the central part of her city, she rents a beauty salon where she gives hairdressing services. She is very popular in her work and known as a very skilled specialist. This can be proved by the quantity of her customers that visit her often at the salon. 

Since she is the only employed person in her family, it is very hard for her to work all day long and cover all the needs alone. This loan she asks as in her workplace she plans to start the sale of cosmetics and perfumes, as an additional source of income. So the loan will be useful for her, as she wants to buy cosmetics and perfumes for sale and also some new equipment for her hairdressing activities.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and perfumes for sale and also some new equipment for her hairdressing activities

loans.name: Fackkhaya Group

texts.en:
Phouvung is excited the filter was available on an affordable, payment plan.  Phouvung and his group, along with other villagers, participated in a village meeting where they discussed the costs of treating local water supplies.  Charcoal, firewood, even bottled water were discussed and priced out over 2 years.  

The water filter Phouvung and his group purchased is guaranteed for 2 years but is known to function for up to 5 years.  Phouvung and his group also discussed the cost of medical care for water-borne disease. And after totaling up the costs, Phouvung and his group recognized the substantial financial savings the water filter will have for them and their families.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Wadha

texts.en:
Wadha is widow, 44 years old and lives in southern Ghour. She is working hard to insure a good life for her five children and to complete their education to give them a chance to be a successful people in the future.

Wadha started her own business to be able cover all the needs for her family, so she is selling ready made clothes to get more income, beside the pension for her dead husband.

Wadha is a very ambitious and patient woman. She faced all the difficulties in the upbringing and education of her children without help from anybody.
Now Wadha wants to expand her work to improve their standard of living, therefore she applied for a loan to help her buy more clothes and products to sell to increase her income.

loans.use: To buy more clothes and products to sell to increase her income.

loans.name: Juan Teofilo

texts.es:
En la ciudadela El Progreso de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúne cada quince días el Grupo De Crédito Santa Rosa Del Cielo esta es una zona urbano marginal muy poblada en esta ciudad en la cual las personas se dedican a sus actividades para salir adelante.
En este lugar vive don Juan, tiene 37 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tienen tres hijos, uno mayor de edad y dos de 17 y 16  años, los menores estudian en colegio y escuela. Su esposa es ama de casa.
El señor Juan es un hombre muy trabajador que realiza varias actividades para darles lo mejor a su familia, es maestro en construcción y realiza sus trabajos por contratos de personas particulares. Además de esto él en su casa tiene  un pequeño deposito  donde vende  agua en bidón con lo cual él se gana algo extra que les ayuda a salir adelante, cuando el no está en casa por su trabajo es su mujer o sus hijos que le ayudan con las ventas y él en las tardes si  sus clientes lo desean entrega a domicilio,  de esta forma el logra darles el pan diario a su familia a base de trabajo honrado. 
Este crédito lo va  a emplear para comprar agua en bidón y herramientas que necesita para su trabajo de albañil. Esta desde el inicio  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son muy necesarios. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
The credit group Santa Rosa del Cielo meets every two weeks in the citadel El Progresso in the city of Portoviejo. This is a suburban area of the city with a very dense population, where people work hard to make a living.

Juan is 37 years old and lives in this place. He lives in cohabitation and has three children from this relationship: one adult, one 17-year old and one 16-year old. The younger ones are going to school and college. His spouse is a housewife.

Juan is a very hard-working man, who works various jobs to give his best for his family. He is a master bricklayer and gets contracted by private persons. In addition, he runs a little store from his house, where he sells big water bottles. This way he makes some extra income to move forward. When he is not at home and out working, his wife or his kids help with the store and in the afternoon he delivers to his customer's homes if they wish. That way he is able to give his family their daily bread through honest work.

He will use this loan to buy big water bottles and tools, which he needs for his work as a bricklayer. He has been in the credit group from the beginning and likes it because the loans are very necessary. He dreams about giving his best for his family.

loans.use: to buy big water bottles and tools.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es: ERNESTO: Es un joven afable de 25 años, pertenece a la etnia miskita, originario del municipio de Waspam. Casado con 3 hijos: El mayor de 9 años estudia su tercer grado de primaria y dos menores de edad. Trabaja como técnico en una empresa de electricidad del municipio. Con gran esfuerzo poco a poco ha iniciado la construcción de su vivienda de madera, sin embargo con su salario no le cubre para realizarle algunas mejoras como Instalación de energía eléctrica y divisiones internas que serán utilizados como cocina y cuartos.  Es por eso que solicitan un préstamo para poder hacer estas mejoras. Con el préstamo va comprar madera cepillada, clavos, cables, panel eléctrico, braker, tomas corriente y pagar la mano de obra. El sueña con tener una casa bonita, con mejores condiciones de seguridad y mejor ambiente para  sus hijos.
texts.en: Ernesto is a friendly young man, 25 years old, who is of the Miskita ethnicity, and from the municipality of Waspam. He is married with 3 children. The oldest is 9 and a third grade student in the primary school and two are younger. He works as a technician at an electrical company in the municipality. With great effort, little by little he has begun to build his wooden house. However, his salary isn't enough to make some improvements such as installing electricity and internal divisions which will be used as a kitchen and bedrooms. For this reason, he asks for a loan to be able to do these improvements. With the loan, he will purchase planed wood, nails, cables, an electric panel, a breaker, electrical outlets, and pay labor costs. He dreams of having a pretty house with more security and a better environment for his children.

loans.use: to install electricity and internal divisions in his wooden stilt house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy supplies and vegetables to produce larger number of pickles and to make good promotion for her work.

loans.name: Diselina

texts.es: DISELINA: Es una señora sonriente y cordial, originaria del municipio de Waspam. Casada con 4 hijos en edad escolar. Ella y su esposo trabajan como docentes de educación primaria. Está solicitando un préstamo para comprar maya, grapas, clavos, madera y cubrir costos de mano de obra, para construir el cerco de casa donde habita con sus hijos y esposa. Su sueño es  brindarle a su familia una vivienda más segura y en buenas condiciones.
texts.en: Diselina is a smiling and warm woman, originally from the municipality of Waspam. She is married with 4 school-aged children. She and her husband work as primary school teachers. She is asking for a loan to purchase wire mesh, staples, nails, wood and to pay labor costs to build the fence for the house where she lives with her children and husband.  Her dream is to provide her family with a more secure house and better conditions.

loans.use: to purchase wire mesh, staples, nails, wood, and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Marlene Maribel

texts.es:
En la ciudadela El Progreso de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúne cada quince días el Grupo De Crédito Santa Rosa Del Cielo esta es una zona urbano marginal muy poblada en esta ciudad en la cual las personas se dedican a sus actividades para salir adelante.
En este lugar vive la señora Marlene, tiene 29 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 10 y 4  años, el mayor estudia en escuela y el menor en inicial. Su esposo es cerrajero y electricista.
Doña Marlene con la finalidad de contar con sus propios ingresos y así salir adelante se dedica a la venta de ropa y productos Avon (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas) trabaja dos días más que todo en las horas de la mañana ya que a esas horas le resulta más fácil realizar sus recorridos. Ella también parte de este crédito lo va a utilizar para ciertos gastos que tiene en los estudios de sus hijos ya que para ella esto es lo más importante.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar ropa, perfumes, bisutería, cosméticos, cremas,  útiles escolares y uniformes para sus hijos. Lleva 3 ciclos en el Grupo De Crédito  y le gusta porque con los créditos ella se ayuda para salir adelante. Sus sueños es darles una buena educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The credit group Santa Rosa del Cielo meets every two weeks in the citadel El Progreso in the city of Portoviejo. This is a suburban area of the city with a very dense population, where people work hard to make a living.

Marlene is 29 years old and lives in this place. She lives in cohabitation and has two children of ten and four years from this relationship. The older one is in school and the younger one in preschool. Her spouse is a locksmith and electrician.

Marlene sells clothes and Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and women's accessories) in order to make her own income and thus improve her financial situation. She works two days, mostly in the morning hours, because during this time it is easier for her to make her trips.

She will also use part of this loan for expenses in her children's education, because for her it is the most important thing. She will use this loan to buy clothes, perfumes, jewelry, cosmetics, cremes, school equipment and uniforms for her children. She has been in the credit group for three loan cycles and she likes it, because the loans help her to move forward. Her dream is to give her children a good education.

loans.use: to buy clothes, perfumes, jewelry, cosmetics, cremes, school equipment and uniforms.

loans.name: Cruz María

texts.es:
En la ciudadela El Progreso de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúne cada quince días el Grupo De Crédito Santa Rosa Del Cielo esta es una zona urbano marginal muy poblada en esta ciudad en la cual las personas se dedican a sus actividades para salir adelante.
En este lugar vive la señora Cruz, tiene 64 años de edad, está separada y de esta relación tiene siete hijos mayores de edad, dos de ellos aun viven con ella.
Doña Cruz realiza el crédito para que su lo utilice su hijo, el se dedica a la venta de anaqueles, adornos y varios artículos de decoración hechos en madera, tres a cuatro veces por semana el se desplaza a la ciudad de Manta lugar en el cual vende sus productos. Su hijo es el que mantiene el hogar razón por lo cual ella le colabora con los créditos ya que es así como ellos pueden financiar el negocio y poder salir adelante,  ya son varios años los que él lleva con esta actividad la cual les da lo necesario para salir adelante.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar anaqueles, adornos y otros artículos de decoración. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito  y le gusta porque así ella puede ayudar a su hijo. Sus sueños es tener un carro para que su hijo venda con más facilidad.
texts.en:
In the El Progreso fortress in the city of Portoviejo, the communal bank group Santa Rosa del Cielo meets every two weeks. It is a highly-populated marginal urban zone in this city, where the people work at their activities to get ahead. 

Cruz lives in this place. She is 64 years old, separated, and from this relationship has seven adult children. Two of them still live with her.

Cruz is taking out the loan so that her son can use it. He works selling shelves, adornments and various decorations made of wood. He goes to the city of Manta three or four times a week, where he sells his product. Her son is the one who maintains the household, so she helps him with the loans since it is in this way that they can finance the business and are able to get ahead. It has now been some years that he has been doing this work, which provides them with what they need to get ahead. 

This loan will be used to purchase shelves, adornments, and other decorations. She has been in the communal bank group since the beginning and she likes it because in this way she can help her son. Her dream is to have a car so her son can make his sales more easily.

loans.use: to purchase shelves, adornments and other decorations.

loans.name: Gema Josselyn

texts.es:
En la ciudadela El Progreso de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúne cada quince días el Grupo De Crédito Santa Rosa Del Cielo esta es una zona urbano marginal muy poblada en esta ciudad en la cual las personas se dedican a sus actividades para salir adelante.
En este lugar vive la señora Gema, tiene 18 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tienen un hijo de 2 meses de edad. Su esposo es electricista.
Doña Gema con la intención de ganarse algo por su cuenta y con esto poder ayudar con los gastos que genera el hogar y la crianza de su pequeña se dedica a la venta de zapatos y productos de  Avon (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta en sus ratos libres y  también vende en su casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes más conocidos, deja a crédito y cobra cada 8 días, lleva más de 1 año con esta actividad que le permite ganar sus propios ingresos.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar  zapatos, cremas, perfumes, entre otros. Lleva 2 ciclos en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos se ayudan para salir adelante. Sus sueños se darles lo mejor a su pequeño.
texts.en:
In the El Progreso fortress in the city of Portoviejo, the communal bank group Santa Rosa Del Cielo meets every two weeks. This is a highly-populated marginalized urban zone in this city, where the people work in their businesses to get ahead. 

Gema lives in this place. She is 18 years old, in a common-law marriage and in this relationship they have a 2-month-old child. Her husband is an electrician. 

Gema, with the intention to earn something of her own and, with this, to be able to help with the household expenses and raising her little one, works selling shoes and Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and ladies' accessories). She sells door-to-door in her free time and she also makes sales in her house where her best-known customers come. She leaves the products on credit and collects each week. She has been doing this work for more than 1 year, which permits her to earn her own income. 

This loan will be used to purchase shoes, creams, perfumes, and more. She has been in the communal bank group for 2 loan cycles and she likes it because, with the loans, they help each other get ahead. Her dream is to give her little one the best.

loans.use: to purchase shoes, creams, perfume, etc.

loans.name: Hrayr

texts.en:
Hrayr is 51 years old and he lives with his wife, who works as a nurse at the hospital, son and school-aged daughter in Spitak city of Lori region. Hrayr has already run his business for 6 years of vegetables and fruits sale. He rents a stall near the center of their city where he sells fruits and vegetables (tomatoes, potatoes, cucumbers, green peppers, eggplants, apples, grapes, peaches, pears, plums, etc.). 

In his business, Hrayr’s son greatly helps him especially with the purchase of new products for their stall. Thanks to his many regular customers, Hrayr keeps his business and he does his best not to lose any of them. Now with this loan, Hrayr asks for the purchase of a great assortment of vegetables that are raised in greenhouses, since still it is early for the vegetables that are gathered from the land.

loans.use: for the purchase of great assortment of early season vegetables that are raised in greenhouses

loans.name: Dongthada Group

texts.en:
Sone’s village sources much of their drinking water from local wells, streams, and collected rainwater.  These sources of water are not safe to drink without treatment by boiling.  Sone and her group are excited that the filter was available on a payment plan that made it much more affordable.  Treating drinking water requires cash and time, which now she can shift to other pursuits.  

Sone and her village also understand the impact unsafe drinking water has on their family’s budgets. The filter is guaranteed for 2 years; within this 2 years filter users, like Sone’s family, identify a substantial decrease in illness and associated medical costs.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Kyamusanju

texts.en: Kyamusanju is a married man who operates a retail shop in Kagadi-Uganda. He supplements his business with pool tables and produce selling, which businesses he ventured in to earn a living. His hardships are poor roads especially during the rainy season, when transport costs are very high which in the end affects his returns. Kyamusanju is requesting a loan to buy general merchandise like sweets, bread, sugar and others to sell.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise like sweets, bread, sugar and others to sell

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is a 33 year aged banker,a credit administrator in one of the banks. He owns a stationary shop in Kagadi Uganda to supplement  his monthly salary income. 

He started a business on realizing that his salary could help him to sustain his family. His desires are to expand his business into new areas and having a healthy family. Peter intends to use the loan to buy a printing machine, text books and printing papers to sell.

loans.use: to buy a printing machine, text books and printing papers to sell.

loans.name: Jhemilen Olimpia

texts.es: Jhemilen tiene 19 años de edad, esta soltera y estudia enfermería en una universidad privada donde ya va por el V ciclo de la carrera, ella se siente muy contenta porque le gusta la profesión que eligió seguir, una vez que termine la carrera de enfermería piensa especializarse en pediatría ya que le agrada cuidar de la salud de los niños. El préstamo lo utilizara en pagar la mensualidad de la universidad y también para comprar los materiales que el estudio le demanda. Uno de los anhelos que tiene Jhemilen es empezar a estudiar ingeniería industrial y también implementar una clínica donde ella misma pueda atender a mucha gente que lo necesita. Ella se siente muy agradecida por el apoyo que se le está brindando y pide encarecidamente que el apoyo siga continuando con muchos chicos que lo necesitan.
texts.en:
Jhemilen is 19 years old, single, and studying nursing in a private university, where she is about to enter the 5th year of her studies.  She is very happy that she likes the profession she decided to pursue.  Once she finishes her nursing school she is considering a specialization in pediatrics as she would like to care for children's health.  

She will use the loan to pay monthly university fees and also to buy the required study materials. One of the Jhemilen's dreams is to study industrial engineering and start a clinic where she could serve many people who need it.   She is grateful for the help you are giving her and asks that you continue to help the many young people who need it.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Elves

texts.es: ELVES: Es un señor luchador de 37 años de edad, pertenece a la etnia miskita del municipio de Waspam. Casado con 4 hijos: 3 en edad escolar y una pequeña de 2 años de edad. Trabaja como docente de escuela de educación primaria. Con gran esfuerzo poco a poco y con el apoyo financiero de PANA PANA y KIVA, ha iniciado la construcción de su vivienda de madera, sin embargo con su salario no le cubre para realizarle algunas mejoras como divisiones internas que serán utilizados como cocina y cuartos.  Es por eso que está solicitando su segundo préstamo para poder hacer estas mejoras. Con el préstamo va comprar madera, clavos y pagar la mano de obra. El sueña con tener una casa bonita, con mejores condiciones de seguridad y mejor ambiente para  su familia.
texts.en:
Elves is a fighter.  He is 37 years old and belongs to the mismita ethnic group of the Waspam municipality.   He is married with 4 children:  3 are school-age and the small one is 2 years old.  He works as a teacher in the primary school.  

Little by little, with great efforts and the financial help from PANA PANA and KIVA, he has begun construction on his wooden house.  However, with his salary he was unable to make better walls which would serve as the kitchen and the rooms.  For this reason he is soliciting a second loan to make these improvements.  With the loan he will buy wood, nails, and labor.  His dream is to have a beautiful house with better security and a better environment for his family.

loans.use: to build interior walls of his stilt and wood home.

loans.name: Laomarkkha Group

texts.en:
Khounsee understands the difference the water filter can make for his family and for his group’s families.  Khounsee knows that local water sources require boiling before consumption and boiling water consumes natural and financial resources.  The water filter Khounsee purchased will increase his family’s disposable income by substantially decreasing money spent to buy charcoal or decreasing the time and cost foraging for firewood.  

The filter also eliminates the need to purchase bottled water if it is available.    Khounsee is excited that the filter was purchased on an affordable payment schedule and the filter is guaranteed for 2 years – so he and his group can continue to receive the many benefits of clean water for many months to come.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Gloria Guadalupe

texts.es:
Las oportunidades solo llegan una vez en la vida, pero es decisión de cada uno aprovecharlas o no. Guadalupe lo tiene presente, pues ella desde joven ha sido perseverante y trabajadora, por ello cuando su suegra le ofreció trabajar en su taller de costura, con gusto aprovecho esa oportunidad, que con el tiempo recibió como herencia. 

El taller se ha vuelto muy próspero y rentable, sin embargo, solicita un crédito para la compra de telas, botones, encajes, zippers, cintas, accesorios y demás. Que le serán de ayuda para incrementar la producción de su negocio, en consiguiente, podrá ofrecer más variedad y atraerá más clientes. Entre los planes de Guadalupe esta ahorrar para comprar su casa.
texts.en:
Opportunities only comes once in a lifetime, but it is up to each one of us whether we take it or not. Guadalupe knows this, because since she was little she has been persevering and hard-working, and when her mother-in-law offered her a job in her sewing workshop, she gladly took the opportunity. After some time she inherited the business.The workshop has become very flourishing and profitable. 

Nevertheless, she is requesting a loan to buy fabrics, buttons, laces, zippers, ribbons, accessories, and the like, to  help her increase the productivity of her business and, as a result, to offer a greater variety and attract more customers. One of Guadalupe's dreams is to safe money to buy a house.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, buttons, laces, zippers, ribbons, and accessories.

loans.name: Night Rosemary

texts.en:
Rosemary is a 40-year-old hardworking married woman with 3 children of ages 10, 17 and 19 years living in Kamwenge, Uganda. She operates a retail shop alongside farming to earn her an extra income. She started this business so as to educate her children. She hopes to expand her business into a wholesale but her major challenge is competition from similar businesses around.

 She is requesting a loan to buy more tomatoes and bread to sell.

loans.use: to buy more tomatoes and bread to sell, to help to educate her children

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
At 32 years of age Patrick is a business man, hard working and trust worthy with a hardware shop and a resident of Kagadi-Uganda. He also does farming which supplements his income. Patrick started his business in 2013 which he has seen grow. 

He is faced with a challenge of high transport costs because he just hires vehicles to transport his goods from the city. Besides business Patrick plans to put up a permanent residential house in future. He requests a loan to buy nails, glasses and padlocks to sell.

loans.use: to buy nails, glasses and padlocks to sell.

loans.name: Nongthad Group

texts.en: Tome understands the difference the water filter can make for her family and for her group’s families. Tome knows that local water sources require boiling before consumption and boiling water consumes natural and financial resources. The water filter Tome purchased will increase her family’s disposable income by substantially decreasing money spent to buy charcoal or decreasing the time and cost of foraging for firewood. The filter also eliminates the need to purchase bottled water if it is available. Tome is excited that the filter was purchased on an affordable payment schedule and the filter is guaranteed for 2 years – so she and her group can continue to receive the many benefits of clean water for many months to come.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Dongnakham Group

texts.en: Bounpan is excited the filter was available on an affordable, payment plan. Bounpan and his group, along with other villagers, participated in a village meeting where they discussed the costs of treating local water supplies. Charcoal, firewood, and even bottled water were discussed and priced out over 2 years. The water filter Bounpan and his group purchased is guaranteed for 2 years but is known to function for up to 5 years. Bounpan and his group also discussed the cost of medical care for water-borne disease. And after totaling up the costs, Bounpan and his group recognized the substantial financial savings the water filter will have for them and their families.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so he can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Wa Group

texts.en: Maiboun’s village sources much of their drinking water from local wells, streams, and collected rainwater. These sources of water are not safe to drink without treatment by boiling. Maiboun and her group are excited that the filter was available on a payment plan that made it much more affordable. Treating drinking water requires cash and time, which now she can shift to other pursuits. Maiboun and her village also understand the impact unsafe drinking water has on their family budgets. The filter is guaranteed for 2 years. Within this 2 years, filter users, like Maiboun’s family, identify a substantial decrease in illness and associated medical costs.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so she can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Surakan

texts.ru: Суракан, 48 лет, замужем, 2 детей. У нее среднее образование, она целеустремленна, знает конкретно чего хочет и добивается всего своими силами. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она на протяжении 10 лет занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду Суракан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 12 лошадей, 100 овец и коз. Для содержания скота имеются все условия. Ежемесячный доход составляет 30,000 сомов (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Суракан обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Суракан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Surakan is 48 and married with two children. She has a high school education and is a purposeful person who knows exactly what she wants and works toward it with all her strength. She has been working in animal husbandry and agriculture for 10 years as the primary source of income for her family. Thanks to her hard work, she currently has 12 horses and 100 sheep and goats on her farm as well as everything necessary to take good care of them. Her monthly income is 30,000 KGS.

With the goal of further developing her business, Surakan has approached Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 KGS to purchase livestock to increase her head count. She plans to put profits from the loan into further increasing the size of her herd.

loans.use: to purchase livestock  in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Kandalat

texts.ru: Кандалат, 62 года, замужем, дети взрослый и самостоятельные. В поиске источника доходов для своей семьи, она 10 лет назад стала заниматься животноводством. Благодаря ее непосильному труду и емкой работе Кандалат достигла хороших успехов в работе и стала получать ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 21,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Кандалат имеется 2 коровы, 47 овец. Кандалат обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS), который она направит на покупку скота. Доходы от кредита Кандалат планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса и накопить на покупку мебели для дома.
texts.en:
Kandalat is 62 and married with adult children who live on their own. She started working in animal husbandry 10 years ago while searching for a source of income for her family. Thanks to her hard work and ceaseless effort, she has achieved great success in her work and now receives a monthly income of 21,000 KGS. She currently has two cows and 47 sheep on her farm.

Kandalat has approached Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 KGS to purchase livestock. She plans to put profits from the loan into further developing her business and saving toward buying furniture for her home.

loans.use: to purchase livestock in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Jaudy Amelia

texts.es: JAUDY AMELIA: Es una joven originaria del municipio de Waspam, casada con 2 hijos menores de edad. Con el propósito de tener su propia fuente de ingresos y contribuir con los gastos del hogar, desde hace 4 años estableció su pequeña pulpería en el corredor de su vivienda de madera. Esta solicitando financiamiento para comprar: Papel higiénico, toallas sanitarias, pasta dental, granos, básicos, chiverías, sardinas, entre otros productos. Ella sueña con ser una comerciante exitosa.
texts.en:
Jaudy Amelia is a young lady originally from the city of Waspam. She is married with two young children. 

She established a little grocery store in the corridor of her home made from wood four years ago with the idea of having her own source of income in order to contribute to the household expenses. 

She is asking for a loan in order to buy: toilet paper, sanitary napkins, toothpaste, grains, basics, Chiverías [brand name of snacks] sardines, among other products. 

She dreams of being a commercial success.

loans.use: to buy toilet paper, sanitary napkins, toothpaste, grains, basics, Chiverías [brand name of snacks] sardines, among other products.

loans.name: Nakoun Group

texts.en: Khambounmee understands the difference the water filter can make for her family and for her group’s families. Khambounmee knows that local water sources require boiling before consumption and boiling water consumes natural and financial resources. The water filter Khambounmee purchased will increase her family’s disposable income by substantially decreasing money spent to buy charcoal or decreasing the time and cost of foraging for firewood. The filter also eliminates the need to purchase bottled water if it is available. Khambounmee is excited that the filter was purchased on an affordable payment schedule and the filter is guaranteed for 2 years – so she and her group can continue to receive the many benefits of clean water for many months to come.

loans.use: to purchase a TerraClear water filter so she can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Nongdeang Group

texts.en: Seethon is excited the filter was available on an affordable, payment plan. Seethon and his group, along with other villagers, participated in a village meeting where they discussed the costs of treating local water supplies. Charcoal, firewood, and even bottled water were discussed and priced out over 2 years. The water filter Seethon and his group purchased is guaranteed for 2 years but is known to function for up to 5 years. Seethon and his group also discussed the cost of medical care for water-borne disease. And after totaling up the costs, Seethon and his group recognized the substantial financial savings the water filter will have for them and their families.

loans.use: to purchase a TerraClear water filter so he can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Kokpho Group

texts.en: Xea’s village sources much of their drinking water from local wells, streams, and collected rainwater. These sources of water are not safe to drink without treatment by boiling. Xea and her group are excited that the filter was available on a payment plan that made it much more affordable. Treating drinking water requires cash and time, which now she can shift to other pursuits. Xea and her village also understand the impact unsafe drinking water has on their family budgets. The filter is guaranteed for 2 years. Within this 2 years, filter users, like Xea’s family, identify a substantial decrease in illness and associated medical costs.

loans.use: to purchase a TerraClear water filter so she can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Stivin

texts.en:
Stivin is a resident of Kagadi-Uganda, aged 39 years and married. He does produce business majorly dealing in maize and cassava and also operates a retail shop as another source of income. He started his business in 2014 because he believes that it is easy to get back your money with such kind of business. 

He plans to start a another business of supplying empty jerrycans. His major challenge is so many debtors and thieves on the roads that hinder his business growth. Stivin describes himself as a honest and God fearing man. Stivin is asking for a loan to buy maize and coffee for selling.

loans.use: to buy maize and coffee for selling to help his business prosper

loans.name: Cathbert

texts.en:
Cathbert of Kamwenge, Uganda used his previous loan to buy more crates of beer, sodas and spirits to sell. His personal goals are to educate his children and develop  himself. He has been in the business of selling alcohol (beers and spirits) for nine years, and his main hardships are price fluctuations,inflation and competition. 

He has a vision of educating his children, moving his business to a more permanent location and expanding his business into a depot to serve new markets. 

He is requesting a loan to buy more crates of beer and spirits to sell.
